review: Awesome. A definite improvement from the Roku we had previously, and much cheaper!
author: Disgruntled

review: I have not been able to set this up at all.
author: april beppler

review: this is a great device! easy to navigate and full of great apps!!! 5 star and all for $39! Bravo Amazon!
author: Catherine White

review: Works very well, I am happy with the content.  Liked it so well talked my sister into getting one and she is very happy as well.
author: William Bastin

review: So easy to install and navigate! Love it .. I bought 2
author: Ann Karen

review: I love it, I just have to figure out how to search for the games I want instead of games already loaded. And I love how I can select something on YouTube on another device and have it play on the TV.💜💜💜💜💜💜💜

We also have a Roku stick and Chromecast.  Both work just fine with our router and internet speed.  Tried the new TV Stick.  Not good.  The programs are constantly buffering.  Completely annoying.  Back to the other two.
author: Pennsylvania Enthusiast
